actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to limit the jurisdiction of the Supreme Court and of the district courts in cases regarding voluntary school prayer.

summary.text: Eliminates Supreme Court and Federal district court jurisdiction to review or hear any case arising out of State law relating to voluntary prayer in public buildings and schools.

titles.title: A bill to limit the jurisdiction of the Supreme Court and of the district courts in cases regarding voluntary school prayer.
